review: Working great on my home wifi. Even though I have a slow internet connection, it can provide me with a excellent video quality (720p) and stable loading speed (Sometimes, it is just a little bit choppy). The only disadvantage is that it doesn't have the function to separate the audio with the video. I was using my computer with my Chromecast. Unfortunately, my monitor doesn't have a sound output so I cannot use it on my 'monitor'. But, as I said, it works great on my TV.
